title: Red Bull Insists Vlasov Cleared Tour de France Concussion Protocols: ‘He Went Straight to the Race Doctor’s Car’
content:
DS says post-crash wobbles caused by fractured ankle: 'That’s why he was not walking straight and tumbling.'

Read the full article at Red Bull Insists Vlasov Cleared Tour de France Concussion Protocols: ‘He Went Straight to the Race Doctor’s Car’ on Velo.
author: ahood
